titleStmt.title: Mr. Vice-Chancellors speech to His Maiestie, at Christ-Church in Oxford, on New Yeares Day when in the name of the whole vniversitie, he presented His Majestie with a faire guilt cup, and two hundred pounds of gold in it.
titleStmt.author: Tolson, John, 1575 or 6-1644.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Newberry Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
